description: This app is targeted to the Flashforge series of 3D printers.

11th grader rockin a creator 3 pro at school for robotics class
enjoying the app, very powerful
the interface is something to get used to however again very powerful
please add the ability to group together objects and retain the respective left and right extruders and highlight the geometry where the two extruders physically bond in the slicer; would make the experience much better and not guess if the model is close enough to the other model to bond correctly or accidentely putting one model inside another.
Force closes when trying to export a sliced object to a printer using the printer's built-in wifi hotspot. Worked before on previous computers but feature is currently broken.
summary: Force closes when sending object to printer
